001package net.tvburger.jdl.adaline;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.datasets.StraightLineWithNoise;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.NeuralNetworks;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.ObjectiveFunction;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Trainer;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.loss.Losses;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.ChainedRegime;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.Regimes;
011
012import java.util.Arrays;
013
014public class AdalineLineMain {
015
016    public static void main(String[] args) {
017        DataSet dataSet = new StraightLineWithNoise().load();
018        DataSet trainingSet = dataSet.subset(11, dataSet.samples().size());
019        DataSet testSet = dataSet.subset(1, 11);
020
021        Adaline adaline = Adaline.create(1, 1);
022        ObjectiveFunction objective = Losses.mSE();
023        LeastMeanSquares leastMeanSquares = new LeastMeanSquares(0.00001f);
024        ChainedRegime regime = Regimes.chainTop().epochs(200).reportObjective().online().bottomChain();
025        Trainer<Adaline> adalineTrainer = Trainer.of(new AdalineInitializer(), objective, leastMeanSquares, regime);
026        adalineTrainer.train(adaline, trainingSet);
027        NeuralNetworks.dump(adaline);
028
029        for (DataSet.Sample sample : testSet) {
030            float[] estimate = adaline.estimate(sample.features());
031            System.out.println("real = " + Arrays.toString(sample.targetOutputs()) + " estimated = " + Arrays.toString(estimate));
032        }
033    }
034
035}
